FuncDef: The dhcp server trust option82 command enables Option 82 on the DHCP server. The undo dhcp server trust option82 command disables Option 82 on the DHCP server. By default, the DHCP server trusts Option 82.
ExtraInfo: This command is used on the DHCP server to enable the Option 82 function. After receiving a DHCP packet that carries the Option 82 field but the giaddr is 0, the DHCP server processes the packet by default. Using the undo dhcp server trust option82 command, the DHCP server discards the packet.
